chapters.title: Chapter 1: Tears from Steel
chapters.info: Rhuarc, p. 54—Tall, broad-shouldered, blue-eyed clan chief of the Taardad Aiel. He has gray streaks in his red hair. He has two wives: Amys, a Wise One, and Lian, roofmistress of Cold Rocks Hold. Rand put him in charge of Cairhien along with Berelain, but Cairhien has now been turned over to local government. Rhuarc and many members of his clan are currently traveling to Arad Doman to meet Rand. See also Amys.
